text: Maurice Lionel Gosfield (January 28, 1913 - October 19, 1964) was an American stage, movie, radio and television actor. He is best remembered for his portrayal of Private Duane Doberman on the sitcom The Phil Silvers Show (1955-1959) and voicing Benny the Ball in Top Cat (1961-1962). ==Other websites== * Category:1913 births Category:1964 deaths Category:People from New York City
title: Maurice Gosfield
